idea:
Pensieve is an Company in AI,ML,NLP Domain building Product for Businesses to use their Data more efficiently.
We have developed our Capability in Linguistics & Text Analytics. Our Founding team consists of people with Entrepreneurial background , Researcher, Professors in University of Columbia University & Carnegie Mellon, IIM Graduate & Lawyers from India's Best University. We have two Products in Market right now :


1.Smriti- AN AI Driven Risk and Contract Lifecycle Management Platform - Smriti is built with a Vision to bring more transparency in Business Ecosystem .

2.Mitra - An AI Driven E-Discovery Platform - Mitra is built with a vision to democratize the Indian Judicial System and ensure that Justice is not an output of Money .



The Company has been part of accelerator program by Reliance as well as Axilor , an accelerator run by Infosys Founders Kris Gopalakrishnan & D. Shibulal.


Check More about Pensieve :
www.pensieve.co.in

We are further expanding Business and Going Globally in Text Analytics & Linguistic Space.We already have started to explore in South - East Asia Market through Accelerator , Supercharger, Asia's leading Fin-tech Accelerator.We are exploring options in US & North America market.
name: PENSIEVE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Marcellus Investment Managers Pvt Ltd is a SEBI registered provider of Portfolio Management Services and Investment Advisory. At Marcellus, our purpose is to influence efficient capital allocation in the Indian economy. We do this by channelling household savings towards high quality companies with long track records of efficient capital allocation, who in turn deliver superior returns to savers.
What differentiates us from our competitors are the following factors:
1- Our proprietary algorithm driven quantitative frameworks which use a combination of forensic accounting and capital allocation assessment define our investible universe.
2- Our experienced investment team through in-depth primary research constructs a portfolio of companies with deep competitive moats
3- We then hold these companies for long periods of time with little or no churn which allows us to capture the benefits of long term compounding and deliver superior returns
name: MARCELLUS INVESTMENT MANAGERS PRIVATE LIMITED

name: SEAM eLearning

idea: We, Paschim Solar Private Limited  endeavor to enter Renewable  Energy Solar market by setting up India's most technologically advanced Solar PV Manufacturing Plant in the first phase and subsequently manufacturing the raw materials also like Solar Cells, Wafers , Ingots etc. We plan to setup our plant in DMIC Shendra Aurangabad, with Machinery from World's No. 1 machinery manufacturer from Spain. An investment of 40 Million US $ will be required for the setup in the first phase. The Module Assembly plant will employ around 350 people directly and another 300 indirectly.
name: Paschim Solar Private Limited

idea: BrainWing is an esteemed service provider in Drone Robotics where we assemble and create different drones technology as per the application. We have the in-house capabilities to manufacture, fly and process the output to give the best possible and meaningful results to our clients to help them make informed and timely decisions.
